Package ModuleTransaction

Interface IStatistics

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrdersMetricStatistics
public interface IStatistics
The Statistics interface provides the methods for statistics.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double averageNumberProductsTransaction​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
    Returns average number of products per transaction in format '.##' (two decimal places)
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> averageValueSalesPurchasesDistrict​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
    Returns the average sales/purchases by district on a map
    double averageValueTransactions​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
    Returns the average value of transactions in format '##.##' (two decimal places)
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> calculateAverage​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> valuesDistrict, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> numberTransationsDistrictSender, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> numberTransationsDistrictReceiver)
    Returns in map format the number of purchases and sales by district
    java.lang.Boolean isAvailableToMetrics​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
    Checks if the book is valid for statistical metrics
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> numberOrderSentReceivedByDistrict​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
    Returns the number of orders sent/received by district
    double standardDeviationNumberProductTransactions​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
    Returns the standard deviation of number products by transactions in format '.##' (two decimal places)
    double standardDeviationTransactions​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
    Returns the standard deviation of transactions in format '.##' (two decimal places)

  • Method Details

    • averageValueTransactions

      double averageValueTransactions​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
      Returns the average value of transactions in format '##.##' (two decimal places)
      Parameters:
      ledger - book to calculate averages
      Returns:
      average value of transactions
      Throws:
      AverageException - if the ledger is empty.

    • averageNumberProductsTransaction

      double averageNumberProductsTransaction​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
      Returns average number of products per transaction in format '.##' (two decimal places)
      Parameters:
      ledger - book to calculate averages
      Returns:
      average number of products per transaction
      Throws:
      AverageException - if the ledger is empty (Genisis block only).

    • averageValueSalesPurchasesDistrict

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> averageValueSalesPurchasesDistrict​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
      Returns the average sales/purchases by district on a map
      Parameters:
      ledger - book to calculate averages
      Returns:
      map in format Map <String, Map < String, Double>> (example: Porto={"Compra":60.00,"Venda":30.00}) with values
      Throws:
      AverageException - if the ledger is empty (Genisis block only).
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if block is null

    • numberOrderSentReceivedByDistrict

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> numberOrderSentReceivedByDistrict​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
      Returns the number of orders sent/received by district
      Parameters:
      ledger - book to calculate averages
      Returns:
      map in format Map <String, Map < String, Integer>> (example: Porto={"Enviadas":3,"Recebidas":3}).
      Throws:
      AverageException - if the ledger is empty (Genisis block only).
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if block is null

    • calculateAverage

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> calculateAverage​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> valuesDistrict, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> numberTransationsDistrictSender, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> numberTransationsDistrictReceiver)
      Returns in map format the number of purchases and sales by district
      Parameters:
      valuesDistrict - total purchases and sales
      numberTransationsDistrictSender - number of transactions sent
      numberTransationsDistrictReceiver - number of transactions received
      Returns:
      map in format Map <String, Map < String, Double>> (example: Porto={"Compra":60.00,"Venda":30.00}) with values

    • standardDeviationTransactions

      double standardDeviationTransactions​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
      Returns the standard deviation of transactions in format '.##' (two decimal places)
      Parameters:
      ledger - book to calculate mean and standardDeviation
      Returns:
      value of standard deviation
      Throws:
      AverageException - if the ledger is empty (Genisis block only).
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the ledger is null.

    • isAvailableToMetrics

      java.lang.Boolean isAvailableToMetrics​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
      Checks if the book is valid for statistical metrics
      Parameters:
      ledger - book for check
      Returns:
      true if book is valid
      Throws:
      AverageException - if the ledger is empty (only genesys block).
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the ledger is null.

    • standardDeviationNumberProductTransactions

      double standardDeviationNumberProductTransactions​(java.util.ArrayList<Block> ledger)
      Returns the standard deviation of number products by transactions in format '.##' (two decimal places)
      Parameters:
      ledger - book to calculate mean and standardDeviation
      Returns:
      value of standard deviation
      Throws:
      AverageException - if the ledger is empty (Genisis block only).
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the ledger is null.
